Summary: Scaffold a MauiReactor app via CLI, enable hot reload, or migrate an existing MAUI project.
Remarks: Install the template, create a project with the maui-reactor-startup template, and build/run per target. Install the `Reactor.Maui.HotReload` tool to enable Simple/Full hot reload modes. To migrate an existing MAUI app, add the `Reactor.Maui` package, remove XAML App/Shell/MainPage, create a `MainPage : Component`, and switch `Program.cs` to `UseMauiReactorApp<MainPage>()`. Follow best practices for hot reload by keeping state types simple or in a separate assembly.
